      • beforeRun

        public org.xbib.elasticsearch.plugin.feeder.Feeder<T,R,P> beforeRun()
                                                                                                                                               throws IOException
        Prepare a feed run. Open a client to Elasticsearch and create a queue of input specifications. This method is executed in a single thread before feed threads are created.
        Specified by:
        beforeRun in interface org.xbib.elasticsearch.plugin.feeder.Feeder<T,R extends org.xbib.pipeline.PipelineRequest,P extends org.xbib.pipeline.Pipeline<T,R>>

        Returns:
        this feeder
        Throws:

      • executeTask

        public void executeTask(Map<String,Object> map)
                 throws Exception
        Each feed thread executes this method to do the main work. This method is executed in paralle by all feed threads.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws IOException
        Close a single cycle. First, open connections in the river source are closed, then river mouth is closed. After this, set river state to disabled and save river state.
        Specified by:
        close in interface Closeable
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Overrides:
        close in class org.xbib.elasticsearch.plugin.feeder.AbstractFeeder<T,R extends org.xbib.pipeline.PipelineRequest,P extends org.xbib.pipeline.Pipeline<T,R>>
        Throws:
        IOException - if close failed
